channel.title: Open Source on Minimalist Programmer - Kevin Guay
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Minimalist Programmer - Kevin Guay

item.title: Favorite Open Source Projects
item.description: Overview Open source projects are great in every way. Aside from being free, they offer programmers of all levels a chance to get some real world experience and contribute to the public domain. I am certainly guilty of using open source software and not contributing to it, but that is about to change. Below is an annotated list of my favorite open source projects. I will make an effort to update this list regularly.
